text: Wo le kosɔn, ni n sera ye, a ye kojuu mɛnilu kɛla, n di wo bɛɛ labɔ gbɛ rɔ, baa a ye an mafɔla kuma juuilu la. Kɔni Diyotɛrɛfu ma dan wo ma de. An badenma ɲenematɔmɔnin mɛnilu kelayani, a ti sɔn woilu jiya ko ma a wara. Lemɛniya mɔɔ mɛnilu fanan ka a fɔ ko ii ri karanden woilu lajiya, a ri woilu laban wo ma, ka ban ka ii gbɛn ka bɔ lemɛniya mɔɔilu la dɛkuru rɔ.
